Trans. Angela. To proof.
Melbourne bot. Garden

In the Signs of this morning, dear Mr Odgers, I see a notice of complaint, according to which the gates of the bot. Garden have not been opened in due time, at 6 a.m. I have at once impressed on the four different gardeners, who live on the ground, the necessity of extreme punctuality in this respect, and I do not think that even any real reason for complaint existed. Of course it may accidentally happen that a gate is opened a few minutes later than 6, especially since the 8 hours system was forced on the service, by which the men commence working only at 8, instead of formerly at 6.
